brief_title: Prepulse Inhibition of Startle in Cocaine Dependence - 7
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effects of chronic cocaine use on the acoustic startle response and on gating of this response in humans.
detailed_description: The objective of this study is to assess the effects of chronic cocaine use on the acoustic startle response and on gating of this response in humans.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: Cocaine dependence. Male. Right handed. Negative urine for cocaine Exclusion Criteria: Positive urine for cocaine. History of head trauma. Significant medical disease.
